translations.translation: The Garden will be brought near to those who have taqwa.
Paradise will be brought near those who take heed for themselves and follow the straight path;
(On that Day) the Garden will be brought near to the God-fearing,
On the Day of Judgment Paradise will be brought near
And Paradise will be brought close for the pious.
And Paradise will be brought near to those who had Taqwa.
And the garden shall be brought near for those who guard (against evil),
And Paradise shall be brought forward for the godfearing,
And the Garden will be brought nigh for those who ward off (evil).
When Paradise shall be brought near to the God-fearing
And the Garden shall be brought nigh to the God, fearing.
and paradise will be brought near for the Godwary,
To the righteous, the Garden will be brought near,
And Paradise will be brought near to the Muttaqun (pious - see V. 2:2).
and Paradise shall be brought forward to the cautious.
And Paradise will be brought near for the righteous.
And Paradise will be brought near [that Day] to the righteous.
[26:90] And Paradise will be brought near for the God-fearing, and they will [be able to] see it,
(And the Garden will be brought nigh for those who ward off (evil)) disbelief, idolatry, and indecencies, becoming thus their abode.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَأُزْلِفَتِ ٱلْجَنَّةُ } معناه قُرِّبتْ

translations.translation: And the meaning of the verse {And the Paradise will be brought close}, is that it will be brought near.

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
قلت: وأُزلفت: عطف على ينفع
 وصيغة الماضي فيها وفيما بعدها لتحقق الوقوع
 يقول الحق جل جلاله
 في شأن اليوم الذي لا ينفع فيه مال ولا بنون: { وأُزلفتِ } أي: قُّربت { الجنةُ للمتقين } 
 أي: تزلف من موقف السعداء
 فينظرون إليها
